name: Nautical Movies 2 Quiz | Something in Common | 5 Questions

questions.text: Ward Bond commanded what submarine in 'Operation Pacific'?
questions.explanation:
USS 'Thunderfish'.

	This was a 1951 movie starring John Wayne and Patricia Neal.

questions.text: In what year was the movie 'PT-109' released?
questions.explanation:
1963.

	This movie was based on the true story of John F. Kennedy and starred Cliff Robertson.

questions.text: In what country was 'The Sand Pebbles' set?
questions.explanation:
China.

	This film starred Steve McQueen and was directed by Robert Wise. It was also noted for its excellent photography.

questions.text: Who was the sea captain in the movie 'Fair Wind To Java'?
questions.explanation:
Fred MacMurray.

	A 1953 movie about a skipper who is going after treasures in the south seas.

questions.text: 'The Fleets In' was a 1942 movie starring which of the following?
questions.explanation:
William Holden.

	This was a bouncy wartime musical with music by the Jimmy Dorsey Orchestra. It was later remade as 'Sailor Beware'.
